General.Name: EMP Metals Corp
General.Description: EMP Metals Corp. engages in the acquisition, evaluation, exploration, and development of mineral properties. The company primarily explores for gold and silver deposits. It holds interest in a portfolio of properties located in New South Wales, Australia; and the Li-Brine properties located in Saskatchewan. The company was formerly known as Sentinel Resources Corp. and changed its name to EMP Metals Corp. in November 2021. EMP Metals Corp. was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in North Vancouver, Canada.
